column2: Fiverr International Ltd. develops an e-commerce platform that allows the people to buy and sell digital services. Its platform connects businesses with freelancers offering digital services in more than 200 categories, across more than seven verticals including graphic design, digital marketing, programming, video and animation. Its buyers include businesses of various sizes, as well as sellers comprise a group of freelancers and small businesses. The Companyâ€™s global community of freelancers spans across more than 160 countries.
